title: (x) 90s constructivist looking font - Modula {Dav}
content:
I told client I thought it was fron ITC, one of the early 90’s David Quay fonts but it wasn’t Robotik or Technik which I have, I have seen this before maybe in the old Eyewire or Image Club, but I do not have these catalogs anymore, so I ask can anyone identify it.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [David Quay font?.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113146/http:/typophile.com/files/David%20Quay%20font?.jpg) | 32.46 KB |

 [‹ (x) bulging sans - Hobo {Nicolai}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113146/http:/typophile.com/node/14417 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Antiquités" painted store sign - Helvetica Extd {Anastas} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113146/http:/typophile.com/node/14418 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alchion

comments.content: Ole, you’ve got it back to front. It was David Quay who ripped off Zuzana Licko and Neville Brody in the 90s, not the other way around. ;^)
